Home → New in and suggestions → Meet the Author

Meet the Author

Meet the Author: Guinevere Glasfurd

Written by Brandon King · Published Feb 27, 2017

Guinevere Glasfurd gives us a fascinating insight into her new historical novel, The Words in my Hand.

Meet the Author: Celia Imrie

Written by Brandon King · Published Feb 21, 2017

Actor and writer Celia Imrie answers our questions

Meet the Author: Sara Baume

Written by Brandon King · Published Feb 7, 2017

Award-winning novelist Sara Baume discusses the influences of the authors she read as a teenager, her own experiences, and art on her writing

Meet the Author: Wendy Holden

Written by Brandon King · Published Jan 27, 2017

To mark Holocaust Memorial Day 2017, we've interviewed Wendy Holden. Wendy is the author of Born Survivors, which tells the story of three remarkable women who, along with their babies, beat the odds to survive the Nazi camps.

Meet the Author: Nicci French

Written by Brandon King · Published Jan 17, 2017

Husband-and-wife team Sean French and Nicci Gerrard, aka Nicci French, talk about their literary influences, writing practices, and the enjoyment they derive from meeting readers at Suffolk Libraries.

Meet the Author: Victoria Hislop

Written by Brandon King · Published Jan 3, 2017

Victoria Hislop tells us how Beatrix Potter's work has inspired her, where her ideas come from, and why she thinks libraries are precious.

Meet the Author: Alan Bennett

Written by Brandon King · Published Dec 20, 2016

Alan Bennett talks about his childhood love of Just William and his mother's exaltation of writers, and encourages readers to use their local libraries

Meet the Author: Peter Lovesey

Written by Brandon King · Published Dec 6, 2016

Peter Lovesey explains how he discovered true crime at the age of 8 after his family's home was hit by a Doodlebug, how his crime-writing career began with winning a competition, and why you should submit stock suggestions to your local library service.

Meet the Author: Dame Hilary Mantel

Written by Brandon King · Published Nov 22, 2016

Dame Hilary Mantel tells us why she chose to write about Thomas Cromwell, the advantages of writing short stories in the first person, and the importance of using, celebrating and promoting your local library.

Meet the Author: Lisa Hilton

Written by Brandon King · Published Nov 8, 2016

Lisa Hilton discusses her admiration for John Donne and Evelyn Waugh, changing style with her psychological thriller Maestra, and her experience as a teenage library assistant.

Meet the Author: Deborah Moggach

Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 31, 2016

Deborah discusses her childhood love for Just William, the pleasure of having her novel These Foolish Things adapted into The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel, and the challenge of adapting Pride and Prejudice for the big screen.

Meet the Author: Jodi Picoult

Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 19, 2016

Jodi discusses co-writing with her daughter, switching off from work, and her new novel, Small Great Things.

Meet the Author: Jilly Cooper

Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 6, 2016

Jilly discusses the latest Rutshire Chronicles novel and her love of Suffolk.

Meet the Author: Alan Johnson

Written by Brandon King · Published Sep 22, 2016

Brandon interviews the former postman and chancellor, author of an acclaimed set of memoirs and special guest at our annual book festival, Bookfest.

Meet the Author: Peter May

Written by Brandon King · Published Sep 7, 2016

Brandon King interviews The Lewis Trilogy author Peter May.

Meet the Author: Paula Hawkins

Written by Brandon King · Published Aug 25, 2016

Brandon King interviews The Girl on the Train author Paula Hawkins.

Meet the Author: Rose Tremain

Written by Brandon King · Published Aug 16, 2016

Brandon King interviews Whitbread winner Rose Tremain.

Meet the Author: Alexander McCall Smith

Written by Brandon King · Published Aug 2, 2016

Brandon King interviews Alexander McCall Smith.

Meet the Author: Catherine Banner

Written by Brandon King · Published Jul 26, 2016

Brandon King interviews Catherine Banner.

Meet the Author: Tess Gerritsen

Written by Brandon King · Published Jul 19, 2016

Brandon King interviews thriller novelist, Tess Gerritsen.

About meet the author

Regular interviews with some of the world's biggest-selling authors.

By using our site you agree to our use of cookies. Find out what cookies we use, how they affect you and how you can control them: our cookie policy.
